name: df-odu
body: |- wceq(codu, cmpt(s0, universe, co(cv(s0), csts, cop(cfv(cple, cnx), ccnv(cfv(cple, cv(s0)))))))
comment: Define the dual of an ordered structure, which replaces the order component of the structure with its reverse. See ~ odubas , ~ oduleval , and ~ oduleg for its principal properties. _EDITORIAL_: likely usable to simplify many lattice proofs, as it allows for duality arguments to be formalized; for instance ~ latmass . (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 29-Jan-2015.)
